verses.verse: Shiggaion <S%H7692><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, which he sang <S%H7891><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, concerning the words <S%H1697><s%> of Cush <S%H3568><s%> the Benjamite <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1145><s%>. O LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, in thee do I put my trust <S%H2620><s%>: save <S%H3467><s%> me from all them that persecute <S%H7291><s%> me, and deliver <S%H5337><s%> me:
Lest he tear <S%H2963><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> like a lion <S%H738><s%>, rending it in pieces <S%H6561><s%>, while there is none to deliver <S%H5337><s%>.
O LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, if I have done <S%H6213><s%> this; if there be <S%H3426><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%> in my hands <S%H3709><s%>;

If I have rewarded <S%H1580><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> unto him that was at peace <S%H7999><s%> with me; (yea, I have delivered <S%H2502><s%> him that without cause <S%H7387><s%> is mine enemy <S%H6887><s%>:)

Let the enemy <S%H341><s%> persecute <S%H7291><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>, and take <S%H5381><s%> it; yea, let him tread down <S%H7429><s%> my life <S%H2416><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>, and lay <S%H7931><s%> mine honour <S%H3519><s%> in the dust <S%H6083><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, in thine anger <S%H639><s%>, lift up <S%H5375><s%> thyself because of the rage <S%H5678><s%> of mine enemies <S%H6887><s%>: and awake <S%H5782><s%> for me to the judgment <S%H4941><s%> that thou hast commanded <S%H6680><s%>.
So shall the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the people <S%H3816><s%> compass thee about <S%H5437><s%>: for their sakes therefore return <S%H7725><s%> thou on high <S%H4791><s%>.

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall judge <S%H1777><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>: judge <S%H8199><s%> me, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, according to my righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and according to mine integrity <S%H8537><s%> that is in me.

Oh let the wickedness <S%H7451><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> come to an end <S%H1584><s%>; but establish <S%H3559><s%> the just <S%H6662><s%>: for the righteous <S%H6662><s%> God <S%H430><s%> trieth <S%H974><s%> the hearts <S%H3826><s%> and reins <S%H3629><s%>.
My defence <S%H4043><s%> is of God <S%H430><s%>, which saveth <S%H3467><s%> the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> judgeth <S%H8199><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, and God <S%H410><s%> is angry <S%H2194><s%> with the wicked every day <S%H3117><s%>.
If he turn <S%H7725><s%> not, he will whet <S%H3913><s%> his sword <S%H2719><s%>; he hath bent <S%H1869><s%> his bow <S%H7198><s%>, and made it ready <S%H3559><s%>.
He hath also prepared <S%H3559><s%> for him the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>; he ordaineth <S%H6466><s%> his arrows <S%H2671><s%> against the persecutors <S%H1814><s%>.
Behold, he travaileth <S%H2254><s%> with iniquity <S%H205><s%>, and hath conceived <S%H2029><s%> mischief <S%H5999><s%>, and brought forth <S%H3205><s%> falsehood <S%H8267><s%>.
He made <S%H3738><s%> a pit <S%H953><s%>, and digged <S%H2658><s%> it, and is fallen <S%H5307><s%> into the ditch <S%H7845><s%> which he made <S%H6466><s%>.
His mischief <S%H5999><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> upon his own head <S%H7218><s%>, and his violent <S%H2555><s%> dealing shall come down <S%H3381><s%> upon his own pate <S%H6936><s%>.

I will praise <S%H3034><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> according to his righteousness <S%H6664><s%>: and will sing praise <S%H2167><s%> to the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> most high <S%H5945><s%>.
